attributes.action: Retain lower Mole and Ember water levels amenity
attributes.background: The EA are proposing removing gates and dropping water levels significantly. This will remove the boating access amenity of our rivers.  This petition is to show support for the EA's other proposal of repairing/replacing existing structures to retain water levels and flood defences.

rejection.details:
You could raise your concerns with the Environment Agency. You can find out how to contact them here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/environment-agency#org-contacts

Your MP might be able to take up the issue on your behalf. You can find out how to contact your MP here:

https://www.parliament.uk/get-involved/contact-your-mp/

Or you could contact a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are here:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
